title: New: SUN UP – Machines
body:
I’m racking my brains trying to think who this vocal reminds of me.

There’s a now-defunct outfit from Dundee called [Seams](https://soundcloud.com/seams-1) with a singer sounding not too far from that of **SUN UP’s** Frøydis. Their debut track, _Machines_, is a tenderly composed affair, building delightfully to a rather fantastic finale. Early days it may be, but there’s enough here to suggest that **SUN UP** are well worth keeping an eye on.
